TopupInfo.Title: Credit Purchase
TopupInfo.SubtitleIos: If a course purchased through the iOS app isn’t in your account, check for a 'Pending' transaction in Apple; this may take 24-48 hours to process. If the status changes but the course isn't added, send us your Apple receipt to help resolve the issue.
TopupInfo.SubtitleAndroid: If a course purchased through the Android app isn’t in your account, check for a 'Pending' transaction in Google Play; this may take 24-48 hours to process. If the status changes but the course isn't added, send us your Google Play receipt to help resolve the issue.

Coachmark.SubtitleFansAnalytic: Summary of your fans behavior and demography
Coachmark.SubtitleFansGrowth: Report of your fans growth by fans earned and followers become fans
Coachmark.SubtitleTopFans: Report of your top fans ranking based on their contribution
Coachmark.SubtitleFansInteraction: Percentage of fans interaction with your content
Coachmark.SubtitleFansAge: Percentage of your fans sorted by age
Coachmark.SubtitleFansGender: Percentage of your fans sorted by gender
Coachmark.SubtitleFansCountry: Total of your fans based on country
Coachmark.SubtitleBeam&Sub: Monitor your Beam and sub income here

Coachmark.SubtitlePostTab: View analytic from your post activity and engagement
Coachmark.SubtitlePopularPost: View your popular post based on filter
Coachmark.SubtitlePostEngagementRate: Measure how is your engagement rate in every post you create
Coachmark.SubtitleMyMusic: You can view your album and song summary
Coachmark.SubtitlePopularAlbum: This is your most popular album among your audience
Coachmark.SubtitleTopSong: This is your top song based on like and stream
Coachmark.SubtitleActiveListener: You can view your active listener, average listener streamed and fans stream you song based on filter
Coachmark.SubtitleListenerCountry: Your audience demography based on country
Coachmark.SubtitleListenerAlsoLike: Similar artists that your fans listen into
Coachmark.SubtitleDiscover: The place where you can keep updated about the community
Coachmark.SubtitleComingSoon: This is the list of upcoming album, stay tune!

Coachmark.SubtitleNewSong: Try new release from another musician by exploring new songs here

Coachmark.SubtitlePublicContent: When you post public content, it will visible for all of your followers
Coachmark.SubtitleExclusiveContent: When you post for exclusive content it will only visible to the one who subscribed your content
